prettier.notification.config.updated.bod: Your project’s Prettier configuration has been updated to the new config format.
prettier.notification.formatSelection.re: Prettier⁺ notification restored. “Format Selection” will now reappear in the menu for unsupported syntaxes, showing a warning when used.
“Format Selection” isn’t available for this file type. Supported syntaxes: JavaScript, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Handlebars.

Clicking “Dismiss” will disable the command for unsupported syntaxes.
